price: (Ͻde) abasobͻ (a, ekorͻn paa) ne bͻnefakyε ne ahummͻborͻ a efiri Nehͻ (na abᴐ wᴐn abasoᴐ). Onyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakye Hene, Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ.
arabic: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: darajātin min'hu wamaghfiratan waraḥmatan wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
